Name: Petruchio Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
20 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Gin-based and bittersweet, this bright orange drink has a foamy head, which may mislead some into thinking it is sweet and easy.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2010 by Jamie Boudreau at his Vessel bar in Seattle, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Petruchio Cocktail contains 173 calories
